REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0831 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GET 03-20 0077

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GETS 186 MLN STG AFTERNOON HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had given the money market a further 186 mln stg assistance in the afternoon session. This brings the Bank's total help so far today to 945 mln stg and compares with its revised forecast of a one billion stg deficit. The central bank bought bank bills outright comprising 51 mln stg in band one at 9-7/8 pct and 135 mln stg in band two at 9-13/16 pct. REUTER
